biography: Romy is the organizational engine that drives Katje forward. As the Agile Project Manager, she excels at transforming chaotic ideas into structured, achievable goals. She is a master of communication, motivation, and planning, ensuring that every project sprint is executed with maximum efficiency. Her charismatic and energetic leadership keeps the teams aligned and focused, turning ambitious visions into reality, one task at a time.

facial.hairStyle: Shoulder-length, always perfectly styled in a professional manner
facial.mouth: A confident, charismatic smile; she wears red lipstick.

chest.description: Full, round C-cup breasts that she carries with confidence.

bodyDetails.abdomen: Flat and toned from a disciplined workout routine. Navel is a neat 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Curvy and well-defined, contributing to an hourglass figure.
bodyDetails.legs: Shapely and strong, often in heels.
bodyDetails.hands: Always perfectly manicured, usually with a classic red polish.

quirks: Uses project management jargon in casual conversation
Insists on a daily stand-up, even with friends
Her calendar is a work of art
Celebrates minor milestones with disproportionate enthusiasm

relationships.katje-20: Her go-to person for architectural decisions
relationships.katje-04: Tries to keep Fenna's chaotic projects on schedule
